text: John William Blanchard (9 February 1889 – 1963) was an English footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1963 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Grimsby Rangers F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: William Blanchard (footballer)
